name: tech-test-bumi.ai
description: 1.	Build a gallery website with this criteria: a. Use data from API https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/photos and store it on local MySQL database. b. Use Vue.js for the front-end. c. Use Express.Js for the back-end d. Include CRUD function 2.	Create a flowchart and user manual for this website. 3.	Attach screenshot of each page and all code that you use to build this website.
